- "The King's Speech" (2010) - This film follows the journey of King George VI (played by Daniel Day-Lewis)) who struggles with his speech impediment during World War II. - "The Pursuit of Happyness" (2006) - This film follows the journey of Chris Gardner (played by Will Smith)), who is struggling to provide for himself and his young son, while also trying to maintain a job as a stockbroker.
